actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 236 of the National Housing Act, to require the payment of operating subsidies for projects subject to mortgages insured under such section.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to require the payment of operating subsidies for projects subject to certain federally insured mortgages.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 236 of the National Housing Act, to require the payment of operating subsidies for projects subject to mortgages insured under such section.
